Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teacher (in my case supervisor) had far bigger impact and is taken much more seriously

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Because teacher feedback taken more seriously, it has power to make me feel positively or negatively. GenAI does not trigger a feeling.
